<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>Update RefQual of Demand</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var refQualifierUtils = new RefQualifierUtils(); var tableName = "dmn_demand";
var dmNewRefQual = "javascript:'roles='+DemandConfig.getDemandRole('manager', current.getTableName())"; var dmOldRefQual = "javascript:'roles='+SNC.PPMConfig.getDemandRole('manager', current.getTableName())"; refQualifierUtils.updateRefQual("demand_manager", tableName, dmNewRefQual, dmOldRefQual);
var goalRefQual = "javascript:'sys_idIN' + getGoalIds(current.portfolio, current.strategic_objectives)"; refQualifierUtils.updateRefQual("goals", tableName, goalRefQual, null);
var strategiesOldRefQual = "javascript: current.business_unit ? 'sys_idIN' + getStrategicObjectives(current.business_unit) : "; var strategiesNewRefQual = "javascript: 'sys_idIN' + getStrategicObjectives(current.business_unit);"; refQualifierUtils.updateRefQual("strategic_objectives", tableName, strategiesNewRefQual, strategiesOldRefQual);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-07-19 09:28:31</sys_created_on> <sys_id>017aaaecb73233001326c518ee11a9b6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update RefQual of Demand</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Demand Management" source="com.snc.demand_management">82005a2b47e64210cd4e1ce4316d4346</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_017aaaecb73233001326c518ee11a9b6</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-09-14 12:13:34</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
